message: Hello Bob, I'm offering this product for sale at a price of $14,000. I believe it offers significant value, even at this price point.
Thank you for offering the product, Alice. I understand its value, but I am looking to keep my investment within $10,000. Would you consider reducing the price to $11,000?
Thanks for your counteroffer, Bob.  I appreciate your understanding of the product's value.  While $14,000 is my ideal price point, I could be persuaded to part with it for $13,000.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. Considering my budget constraints, would you be open to selling the product for $12,500?
